thread.title: Obama challenges Clinton, other 2016 candidates on Syria
thread.title_full: Obama challenges Clinton, other 2016 candidates on Syria

title: Obama challenges Clinton, other 2016 candidates on Syria
text: > Top News Obama challenges Clinton, other 2016 candidates on Syria President Barack Obama leaves the State Dining Room of the White House in Washington, Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, following a news conference which included his announcement that Education Secretary Arne Duncan will be stepping down in December after 7 years in the Obama administration. Duncan will be returning to Chicago and Obama has appointed senior Education Department official, John King Jr., to oversee the Education Department. (AP Photo/Andrew Harnik)
